Information.Name: growl
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, container, tablecell, form, flexcontainer

Language.Sentence: The Growl type produces an object displayed as a pop-up notification. The 'Title' and the "Text' attributes are mandatory, the rest are optional. In order to show the growl message when some event occurs, the 'Active' attribute must be changes to 'Yes' from the script.
The order of rendering the object on the page. The objects with identical values of the Hierarchy attribute are rendered in the order they are written in the XML-file of the VDOM application.
Spacing in pixels between the object and the top border of the container, in which the object is situated.
Spacing in pixels between the object and the left border of the container, in which the object is situated.
The width of the object in pixels.
The height of the object in pixels.
The title of the object to display, may be in the HTML format. In some objects the title is not displayed if the 'Title appearance' attribute is set to 'Title off'.
The text content of the object, may be in the HTML format.
The CSS style of the object. If the user changes CSS style, the Skin attribute is changed to the 'User defined'.

The names of CSS classes separated by spaces. The names can consist only of Latin characters, may include hyphen (-) and underscore (_). These classes will be attached to the <body> tag: <body class="name1 name2" ...>.
The CSS style of the object. If the user changes CSS style, the Skin attribute is changed to the 'User defined'.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 99.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 9999.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 9999.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 999999.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 999999.
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer.
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer.
Define if the objects sticks or not
Define if the objects sticks or not
Define if the objects sticks or not
Define if the objects sticks or not
Hiérarchie de l'objet, ordre de chargement de l'objet par rapport aux autres
Distance depuis le bord haut de l'objet parent en pixels
Distance depuis le bord gauche de l'objet parent en pixels
Расстояние от верхней границы родительского контейнера до объекта в пикселях
Расстояние от левой границы родительского контейнера до объекта в пикселях
Высота объекта в пикселях, не более 2880 пикселей
Неправильное значение, должно быть целое положительное число
Неправильное значение, должно быть целое положительное число
